feed.title: All About Everything
feed.subtitle: A show about everything
feed.author: John Doe
feed.summary: All About Everything is a show about everything. Each week we dive into any subject known to man and talk about it as much as we can. Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Store

entries.author: John Doe
entries.subtitle: A short primer on table spices
entries.summary: This week we talk about salt and pepper shakers, comparing and contrasting pour rates, construction materials, and overall aesthetics. Come and join the party!
entries.title: Shake Shake Shake Your Spices

entries.author: Jane Doe
entries.subtitle: Comparing socket wrenches is fun!
entries.summary: This week we talk about metric vs. old english socket wrenches. Which one is better? Do you really need both? Get all of your answers here.
entries.title: Socket Wrench Shootout

entries.author: Various
entries.subtitle: Red + Blue != Purple
entries.summary: This week we talk about surviving in a Red state if you are a Blue person. Or vice versa.
entries.title: Red, Whine, & Blue
